testimonials.title: Metta's teaching style is incredibly patient and encouraging. In just six months, I've progressed from beginner to confidently playing intermediate pieces. Her jazz influences add such a fresh perspective to classical technique.
Her solo piano performance at the Java Jazz Festival was mesmerizing. The way she blends contemporary jazz with classical influences creates such unique and emotional music. A true artist!
Metta composed the perfect score for our documentary. Her orchestral work with the Budapest Scoring Orchestra brought such depth and emotion to our film. Highly professional and incredibly talented.
